I just manually dropped most of the prices in my ebay store.  If you'd like anything in there, let me know here and I can give the following discounts:

- 10% off my ebay price (plus shipping) if you're paying with Paypal Goods

-13% off my ebay price if you're paying with a "no-fee" method

[URL="https://www.ebay.com/usr/lukesvintagecards"]https://www.ebay.com/usr/lukesvintagecards[/URL]

Let me know if you'd like anything.  PM here is fine or email:

[url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]
